-   **Tender Title:** RFSO Tibular Knit Fabric and Neck Band (Collar)
    **Procurement Opportunity:** Competitive Bidding
    **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
    **UNSPSC Code:** [11160000][Fabrics and leather materials]

#### Contract Overview
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), seeking to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for CORCAN, invites suppliers to submit their proposals for the supply of single jersey tubular knit fabric and neck bands (collar) in royal blue color.

#### Scope of Work
The successful supplier will be required to provide fabric and neck bands that meet the technical requirements outlined in Annexes A & B. Orders will be issued on an "as and when requested" basis for a period of one (1) year, with the possibility of extending for two (2) additional one-year periods.

#### Technical Requirements
The supplier must provide fabric and neck bands that meet the following specifications:

*   Single jersey tubular knit
*   Royal blue color
*   Meets the technical requirements outlined in Annexes A & B

#### Delivery and Installation
The supplier will be responsible for delivering the fabric and neck bands to the designated locations in Drummondville, Laval, and Cowansville, Quebec.

#### Contact Information
Mario Lafleur, contact person for SPAC/PSPC, can be reached at [mario.lafleur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mario.lafleur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
